briefdescription.para: Smart pointer to dataset.
Whether the hierarchy item is selected.
Whether the item is expanded or not (when it has children)
Attached widget actions.

memberdef.argsstring: (Dataset< DatasetImpl > dataset, Dataset< DatasetImpl > parentDataset, bool visible=true, bool selected=false)
memberdef.name: DataHierarchyItem

briefdescription.para: Construct with smart pointer to dataset, parentDataset and possible configure whether the item is visible and/or selected.

parameterdescription.para: Smart pointer to dataset
Smart pointer to parent dataset (if any)
Whether the dataset is visible
Whether the dataset is selected

briefdescription.para: Get parent item.

simplesect.para: Pointer to parent item (nullptr if the item has not parent item)

briefdescription.para: Set pointer to parent hierarchy item to parent.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to parent hierarchy item (root item if nullptr)

briefdescription.para: Get ancestors.

simplesect.para: Pointers to data hierarchy item ancestors (bottom-up)

briefdescription.para: Get children, possibly recursively.

parameterdescription.para: Get children recursively

simplesect.para: Vector of pointers to child items

briefdescription.para: Get number of children.

parameterdescription.para: Count recursively @returm Number of children

briefdescription.para: Establishes whether the item has any children.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the item has any children

briefdescription.para: Get the depth of the item w.r.t.

detaileddescription.para:
its furthest ancestor
Item depth (root starts at zero)

briefdescription.para: Determine whether the item is a child of item.

parameterdescription.para: Item to check for

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether item is an ancestor or not

briefdescription.para: Determine whether the item is a child of one of items.

parameterdescription.para: Items to check for

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the action is child of one of actions or not

briefdescription.para: Set visibility to visible possibly recursively.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the data hierarchy item is visible or not
Whether to set child data hierarchy items recursively or not

briefdescription.para: Gets whether the hierarchy item is selected.

simplesect.para: Boolean determining whether the item is selected

briefdescription.para: Sets the selection status to selected and possibly clear the global selection.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the hierarchy item is selected
Whether to clear the global data hierarchy selection

briefdescription.para: Selects the data hierarchy item.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to clear the global data hierarchy selection

briefdescription.para: De-selects the hierarchy item.
Get the dataset.
Get the dataset as DatasetType.
Get reference to dataset smart pointer.
Get reference to dataset smart pointer of a specific type.

simplesect.para: Reference to dataset smart pointer of a specific type

briefdescription.para: Get the dataset type.
Attach widgetAction.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to widget action to attach

briefdescription.para: Returns list of shared action widgets.
Get the context menu.

parameterdescription.para: Parent widget

briefdescription.para: Populates existing menu with actions menus.

parameterdescription.para: Context menu to populate

briefdescription.para: Lock the dataset and possibly cache the current lock state.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to cache the current lock state

briefdescription.para: Unlock the dataset and possibly cache the current lock state.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to cache the current lock state

briefdescription.para: Get whether the dataset is locked.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the dataset is locked

Whether to cache the current lock state

briefdescription.para: Restore the lock status to the cached value.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the item is expanded or not

parameterdescription.para: Boolean determining whether the dataset is expanded or not

briefdescription.para: Load widget action from variant.

parameterdescription.para: representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Save widget action to variant.

simplesect.para: Variant representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Signals that item selection changed to selected.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the item is selected or not

briefdescription.para: Signals that widgetAction was attached to the data hierarchy item.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the widget action that was added

briefdescription.para: Signals that the set icon has changed.
Signals that the dataset name changed to datasetName.

parameterdescription.para: New name of the dataset

briefdescription.para: Signals that the locked status changed to locked.

parameterdescription.para: Locked

briefdescription.para: Signals that the visibility changed to visibility.

parameterdescription.para: Visibility

briefdescription.para: Signals that the parent changed to parent.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to parent data hierarchy item (might be nullptr)

briefdescription.para: Data hierarchy item class.

detaileddescription.para: Represents a dataset as an item in the data hierarchy, see the AbstractDataHierarchyManager
